text: Craig Andrew Fallon (18 December 1982 â€“ 15 July 2019) was a British judoka. He was born in Wolverhampton, West Midlands. In September 2005, Fallon won the -60 kg weight class at the World Judo Championships in Cairo. He became only the third British male to win a world title. Fallon died on 15 July 2019 at the age of 36. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British martial artists Category:Judoka Category:Sportspeople from Wolverhampton
title: Craig Fallon
